Chapter 9, Section 91, Muthanso kusuza chigamulo chomwe amfumu ammuzi mwanga angapange. Mu Chapter IX, Section 91 ya Malawi Constitution, malamulo amalola kuti mukhale ndi mwayi wopemphera chigamulo. Mukhoza kutenga njira zakukumbukira chigamulo cha amfumu, monga kufunsa abwino pa nkhaniyi. Ndikofunika kudziwa malamulo omwe akukhudzidwa, komanso kupeza thandizo kuchokera ku mabungwe a ntchito zothandiza anthu. Chifukwa cha izi, mukhoza kuchita nawo kumvetsa zinthu ngati mwachita chigamulo chachikulu chomwe chingathetsedwe mu maudindo a amfumu.

Chapter:  4, section:  20,Ufulu wopanga mawu ndi wofunikira pa zochitika za boma, monga momwe zimakhalira mu Chapter IV, Section 20 ya Malawi Constitution. Izi zimakupatsani ufulu woti muwoneke, kukamba, ndi kutenga nawo mbali muzochitika za boma popanda kutaya chinsinsi kapena kudandaula. Mukhoza kugwiritsa ntchito ufulu uwu kuti mupeze njira yokwaniritsira misonkhano, kupanga magulu, komanso kulankhula ndi akuluakulu a boma pa nkhani zomwe zikukhudzana ndi anthu ndi gawo lawo mu boma. Chifukwa chake, ufulu umenewu umakuthandizani kukhala ndi mawu mu ntchitoyi ya boma.

Chapter 4, Section 25, Ayi, mwana wanu msikana sanathe kukanizidwa sukulu chifukwa choti ndi msikana. Mu Chapter IV, Section 25 ya Malawi Constitution, malamulo amatsimikizira ufulu wophunzira kwa aliyense. Malamulo a Education Act (2013) akuthandiza kuteteza ufulu wamaphunziro a asiskana. Kukanizidwa sukulu chifukwa cha kugawana kwa magulu si chovomerezeka mu malamulo a Malawi. Chifukwa cha izi, asiskana akuyenera kupatsidwa mwayi wofanana mu sukulu.

Chapter:  4, section:  19, Ngati akundikaniza chithandizo chachipatala, mutha kuchita kuti mukhale ndi mwayi wothandizidwa. Choyamba, perekani kuta ndi akuluakulu a chipatala kuti mulankhule za momwe mukumva. Mukhoza kufunsa khoti kuti mupeze chitetezo, komanso kulankhulana ndi mabungwe a chitetezo kuti mupeze thandizo. Dziwani malamulo ndi zofunikira za chithandizo, ndipo perekani chitsimikizo cha chithandizo chofunikira. Onetsetsani kuti mukudziwa ufulu wanu ndi zomwe mukufuna kuti mupeze chithandizo chachipatala.
